about_the_game:
Rings of Eden is an indie open-world RPG inspired by Souls-like games, that blends fantasy, science-fiction, adventure and satisfying combat.



Uncover a labyrinth of secrets, take on enemies, and explore a world where nothing is as it seems.

Violently ripped from his former life, Jake is forced to adapt and become stronger to survive life on The Ring. He must work with others like him to wield newfound abilities and escape The Ring before it destroys him.

  • A vibrant yet dangerous world, complete with complex characters
  • Discover the secrets of The Ring and its origins
  • Overcome terrifying enemies, building up your skills to master your favourite techniques
  • Get lost in far-reaching, story driven quests



  • Enhanced combat and strategy: Choose skills that suit your playstyle
  • Character customisation: Customise your look to your taste

name: Rings of Eden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. Attention: In this game you will encounter a variety of visual effects that may provide seizures or loss of consciousness in a minority of people. If you or someone you know experiences any of the above symptoms while playing, stop and seek medical attention immediately.
